name: mobilizon
description: Mobilizon is a decentralized event management and group organizing platform. It allows users to create, manage, and share events in a federated, privacy-friendly environment with custom groups.
features: Event creation: Organize gatherings with date, location, description, and RSVP tracking for attendee management.
Federation support: Share events across Mobilizon instances and discover activities from other federated servers.
Group management: Create communities with membership controls, discussion spaces, and shared event calendars.
Privacy options: Set events as public, unlisted, or private to control visibility and attendance permissions.
RSVP tracking: Collect attendance confirmations and manage participant lists with automatic notifications.
Event discovery: Browse public events by location, category, or date to find activities in your area.
Recurring events: Schedule repeating activities with customizable frequency and exception handling.
ActivityPub integration: Connect with the fediverse to reach wider audiences beyond your local instance.
